name: Deliforce Shipping
author: Deliforce

sections.description:
Deliforce are building this plugin to connect with our e-commerce clients to get last mile delivery integration. So we are connecting with Deliforce system to send order from woo-commerce to that system.

Plugin have provided a delivery task method and pickup and delivery task method. And woocommerce order status can be updated using deliforce webhook. Customer needs to create a webhook from wordpress admin panel.

Features

  • Customer can enable deliforce shipping from Admin panel->Woocommerce->Settings->Shipping->Deliforce Shipping.,
  • Customer can set price for deliforce shipping method.,
  • Customer can Select delivery tasks or pickup and delivery task.,
  • If customer choose pickup and delivery option, then customer need to set pickup and delivery address.,
  • Customer can create webhook for deliforce from woocommerce deliforce shipping. webhook will update the order status automatically when some actions done in deliforce.,
  • Customer can customize the order status label from order status customisation.,

Link to the service

https://app.deliforce.io/login

Link to the services’ a terms of use and privacy policies

https://www.deliforce.io/privacy-policy & https://www.deliforce.io/terms-and-conditions

short_description: Deliforce shipping methos is used to create a Task in Deliforce system using API.
